commit_title: Add ink physics animation and output GIF
commit_message: Add a new Matplotlib animation script (scripts/ink_physics_animation.py) that simulates three circles (A, B, C) with easing/repulsion behavior to visualize an "ink ratio" physics demo. The script animates positions and opacity, attempts to save an MP4 via ffmpeg and falls back to a GIF (public/ink_ratio_physics.gif) using Pillow; output is placed in the public directory. Requires numpy, matplotlib, and either ffmpeg or Pillow to export the animation.
